title: [娱乐]TrollCommands++ —— 恶搞你的朋友吧！[1.7-1.11]
author: 贺兰兰
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shaokeyibb 于 2017-9-27 00:14 编辑 

没错又是我我又来搬运插件了！

TrollCommands++ For the people that really hate their friends-== |  ==-
Troll恶搞指令++ 目前最新版本3.8.26
它可以干什么不用我说了吧2333333
（排版？不存在的！）搬运授权




360截图20170614194137913.jpg (18.9 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2017-6-14 19:44 上传





效果图（大图预警）

注意：本插件需要LibsDisguises或者iDisguise支持!
那么这插件到底如何使用呢？（指令列表）
白色边框的表示汉化可能有误/不会汉化/未汉化
/troll (page): 查看插件帮助
/vaporize, /vap <player> [power]: 在玩家周围发生爆炸，power为爆炸力量大小，填写为负值爆炸将不会爆破地形
/lift <player>: 类似于把你弹上去的效果，而且着陆伤害自己承担233333
/creep <player>: 在玩家位置生成一个闪电苦力怕
/swap <player> <player>: 互换两个玩家的位置，Freaky Friday style？
/entomb <player>: A premature burial.
/slowpoke <player>: Applies a slowness effect to the player. Like a pokemon!
/electrify, /elec <player>: Thine enemy shalt feel the wrath of many angry gods.
/zombify, /zomb <player>: 召唤尸潮！
/slap <player> [force]: Slaps the player. Yep. Slaps them.
/cannon [speed]: 发射一个tnt到你看着的位置，speed为飞行速度（这里与原版/tnt指令不同的是这里是发射而不是直接召唤一个tnt）
/banish <player> [range]: 类似于随机传送的效果，range为最大传送半径
/bomb <player>: May balls of fire rain down upon thine enemy.
/freeze <player>: Don't like someone? Turn them into a statue!
/comet [power]: Shoots a fireball of adjustable power.
/stampede <player>: Unleashes a herd of mad cows on the player.
/haunt <player>: Toggles random sounds near the player.
/lure <player>: Attracts nearby monsters to the player.
/garble <player>: ..And now the player makes even less sense!
/weakling <player>: Applies a weakness effect to the player.
/spin <player>: This might make them a bit dizzy.
/burn <player>: AHH! FIRE! FIRE! FIIREE!!
/spam <player>: Spams the player's chat with useless junk.
/delaykill <player> <seconds>: Kills a player with a delay.
/potato <player>: I hope they REALLY like potatoes.
/starve <player>: They must have a REALLY fast metabolism!
/hurt <player>: Where is all this damage coming from?!
/void <player>: Think Journey to the Center of the Earth, except with death at the end.
/slowmine <player>: Applies a mining fatigue effect to the player.
/nausea <player>: Applies a nausea effect to the player.
/control <player>: Allows you to take control of a player. Oooh, spoooky!
/vegetable <player>: Turns the player into a potato. Potato simulator 20XX!
/hound <player>: Releases angry hounds on the player. Who let the dogs out?
/infinity <player>: Makes the player fall indefinitely.
/lavabreak <player>: The next block a player breaks turns to lava.
/golem <player>: Think War of the Worlds, golem style.
/portal <player>: The quickest way to The End!
/flip <player>: Flips the player around very quickly.
/alone <player>: Hides all other players from the specified player.
/annoy <player>: Hrmm. Hmm.. Hrrm.. Hrm. Hm. Hmm..
/sparta <player>: Our arrows will blot out the sun! .. Pincushion-y!
/night <player>: Sets the player's time to night permanently. Does not affect the server.
/rewind <player>: Makes the player's time run backwards at speed. Does not affect the server.
/lag <player>: Makes the player experience fake lag. Does not affect the server.
/explodebreak, /exbreak <player>: The next block the player mines explodes!
/slender <player>: Blinds and slows the player, then sends an enderman after them.
/anvil <player>: Now who could have put that up there?
/popup <player>: Randomly opens and closes the player's inventory.
/display <player>: Put your friends and enemies on display!
/nopickup <player>: Stops the player from picking up items.
/brittle <player>: They're made of glass!
/squid <player>: .. Why is it raining squids?
/useless <player>: Renames all of the player's items to Useless.
/whoami <player>: Seriously, though. Who even am I? (Changes the player's name constantly)
/clumsy <player>: Careful, or you'll end up dropping all of your stuff!
/amnesia <player>: Screws with the player's chat in weird ways.
/explodebuild, /exbuild <player>: The next block the player places explodes!
/slowundo <player>: Slowly undoes any block changes the player makes.
/scare: SSSSssssssssss..

权限

tcpp.immune: Player is immune to effects
tcpp.control.chat: Player can chat while being controlled.
tcpp.control.freecam: Player has the ability to fly around while being controlled.

tcpp.command.*: Player can use ALL effects
tcpp.command.troll: /troll
tcpp.command.vaporize: /vaporize, /vap
tcpp.command.lift: /lift
tcpp.command.creep: /creep
tcpp.command.swap: /swap
tcpp.command.entomb: /entomb
tcpp.command.slowpoke: /slowpoke

汉化努力进行中。。。。。。

replies.author: 秋风残叶
replies.txt_content:
插件版基本法 2-10
如汉化不是粗制滥造，为了表示对汉化者劳动的尊重
可以选择以下两种方式得到不强制性的物质回报
1.在征得插件作者的同意下,可以使用Adfly等收益链接
2.或插件汉化不是粗制滥造可以在帖子末尾留下您的捐款方式
收取不强制性赞助.
也就是说你要汉化了才能收赞助，而不是收了赞助再汉化，请修改
